unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing Buzz: Brand Collaborations!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing Buzz: Brand Collaborations!**

unnormalised: Hey fam! What's trending? Brand collabs, obviously! Seems like every influencer from Delhi to Chennai is teaming up with someone these days.
normalised: Hey fam! What is trending? Brand collabs, obviously! Seems like every influencer from Delhi to Chennai is teaming up with someone these days.

unnormalised: Heard that Masala Chai Chronicles, that foodie blogger, just bagged a deal with Haldiram's! Think limited-edition biryani-flavored chips for Diwali - wild, right? And Priya Sharma, the fashion influencer, is rocking a new line of handloom sarees in partnership with a cooperative from Kerala, just in time for Onam!
normalised: Heard that Masala Chai Chronicles, that foodie blogger, just bagged a deal with Haldiram's! Think limited-edition biryani-flavored chips for Diwali - wild, right? And Priya Sharma, the fashion influencer, is rocking a new line of handloom sarees in partnership with a cooperative from Kerala, just in time for Onam!

unnormalised: Even smaller accounts are getting in on the action. Remember Rohan's travel page? He's doing a paid promotion for homestays near the beaches of Goa. Smart move!
normalised: Even smaller accounts are getting in on the action. Remember Rohan's travel page? He is doing a paid promotion for homestays near the beaches of Goa. Smart move!

unnormalised: It's not just about the big names anymore. Brands are realizing the power of micro-influencers too. Talk about reaching niche audiences!
normalised: It is not just about the big names anymore. Brands are realizing the power of micro-influencers too. Talk about reaching niche audiences!

unnormalised: Experts say authenticity is key, folks. No one wants to see a forced partnership. Keep it real, and the collabs will keep comin'.
normalised: Experts say authenticity is key, folks. No one wants to see a forced partnership. Keep it real, and the collabs will keep coming.

unnormalised: What are some of your favorite recent brand collaborations? Let us know in the comments! Are there some creators who should team up? Maybe Lays India and a chaat street food vendor? Hmmm... possibilities!
normalised: What are some of your favorite recent brand collaborations? Let us know in the comments! Are there some creators who should team up? Maybe Lays India and a chaat street food vendor? Hmmm... possibilities!
